Header: Procession carrying the Sacred Relics on its way to the Sirasa – John Keells Vesak Zone
Content: The procession carrying the sacred relics to the Sirasa – John Keells Vesak Zone, jointly organised by The Capital Maharaja Organisation Limited and John Keells Holdings commenced its journey from the Matiyagane Mayuravathi Rajamaha Vihara in Narammala. The Sirasa – John Keells Vesak Zone will take place at the premises of the MTV / MBC Head office this time around as well. The procession carrying the sacred relics to the Vesak Zone commenced from the Yatihalagala Rajamaha Viharaya in Kandy on April 29 . The procession carrying the Sacred Savanna relics of Lord Buddha and the Maha Rahath Theros began its journey today at 8 a.m. from the Mayuravathi Rajamaha Vihara in Matiyagane. The special chest containing the sacred relics were placed in the special vehicle by the Chief Incumbent of the Temple Veneralble Marasanna Palitha Thero. The procession reached Divulapitiya via Giriulla and Dambadeniya.
